articles.title: Children’s hospital threatened after Libs of TiKTok recording on trans hysterectomies
articles.description: Children's National Hospital in D.C. faced a torrent of threats after a right-wing Twitter account published a recording that falsely suggested the hospital is performing hysterectomies on transgender children.
